All employees should take at least 10 days of holiday in a working year at once.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vacation deadlines\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unused annual vacation rolls over to the following year automatically.  The Company strongly encourages employees to use their annual regular vacation (20 working days per year) as an option for recharge and keep the right work-life balance, and it is not healthy for the Company to have a big not used vacation balance. However, according to the Labor code, unused regular vacation days may be carried over to 3 following working years. Compensation request for unused regular vacation should be submitted and can only be paid in case an Employee leaves the Company.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3 working days of additional regular vacation can be used only during current year + first 6 month of next working year. 3 working days of additional vacation cannot be accumulated and carried over to later period. 3 working days of additional vacation may be taken only when the rest of annual vacation is used. These 3 additional vacation days are not the subject of compensation in case of leaving the Company.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To get the balance of the available and used vacation days, an payment in advance\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When employees submit regular vacation request, they must choose if they want their vacation allowance to be paid in advance or together with a monthly salary. In order to receive vacation allowance with monthly salary, employees should select the “Vacation pay is granted with the salary for the respective month” checkbox while submitting a request on vacation.epam.com. If employees do not select this checkbox, vacation allowance will be paid in advance.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please be aware that if a vacation request is submitted later than the recommended notice period, vacation allowance will be paid only in the next payroll. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Scheduled vacation dates can be shifted if necessary but should be approved additionally.
